In a quiet village, there stood a peculiar house that walked on legs of sturdy oak. Each dawn, it would lumber to a new spot, seeking sunlight and fresh views. The villagers marveled, whispering tales of its magic. One day, a curious girl named Elara followed it, discovering that the house carried memories of those who lived inside. Each room held laughter, love, and sorrow, woven into its walls. Elara realized the house walked to share its stories, connecting the past with the present. Inspired, she began writing tales of her own, ensuring that every memory, like the house, would never fade.
